content:
As an AI language model I do not have this information at the moment, but it's safe to say that DARPA is always working on new technologies to improve U.S. national security. DARPA invests in cutting-edge research and development projects aimed at addressing emerging security threats. 

Some areas that DARPA is likely focusing on include artificial intelligence, quantum computing, and biotechnology. These are all emerging technologies that have the potential to transform national security in various ways. For example, AI could help automate many aspects of military decision-making, while quantum computing could provide unprecedented levels of encryption for secure communication systems. Biotechnology could help develop new vaccines and treatments for biological threats.

Overall, DARPA is always pushing the boundaries of what is possible technologically to enhance U.S. national security. With their track record of success, we can be sure that they will continue to develop groundbreaking technologies to address the most pressing security challenges of the future.
